mapper.update: update ticketstock set cnt=cnt+#{cnt} where usernum=#{usernum} and contnum=#{contnum} and type=#{type}
update ticketstock set cnt=cnt-1 where usernum=#{usernum} and contnum=#{contnum} and type=#{type}
mapper.select: select * from ticketstock where usernum=#{usernum} and contnum=#{contnum} and type=#{type}
select nvl(sum(cnt),0) totCnt from ticketstock where usernum=#{contnum} and contnum=#{contnum}
